name: Prendergast School
trainWithUs: Prendergast School and King's College London are both recognised by OFSTED as outstanding providers. Training within a consortium of other Lewisham and Prendergast Federation schools you will have excellent career opportunities in education. To enhance your school direct experience Prendergast School is the lead, providing in school training to support your learning on Kings PGCE course.
trainWithDisability: We welcome applicants with disabilities and have a track record of providing strong mentoring to support trainees with disabilities.
